medical_history.chief_complaint: Intermittent erythema and irritation of the left lower eyelid.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms have been present for 10 years, with periodic episodes of erythema and irritation that failed to improve with lid hygiene, topical lubricants, and corticosteroids.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Tuberculosis contact during childhood (mother had pulmonary tuberculosis).
